LightningComponentBundle.description: Displays business rule evaluation results with step-by-step explanations following Ontario Design System standards. Integrates with Salesforce Business Rules Engine DecisionExplainer API.

property.name: heading
property.label: Heading
property.description: Heading text displayed above the results

property.name: expressionSetApiName
property.label: Expression Set API Name
property.description: The API name of the expression set to evaluate. Required when using Expression Set method.

property.name: integrationProcedureName
property.label: Integration Procedure Name
property.description: The Integration Procedure name (Type_SubType format). Required when using Integration Procedure method.

property.name: evaluationMethod
property.label: Evaluation Method
property.description: How to evaluate the business rules

property.name: inputVariablesJson
property.label: Input Variables (JSON)
property.description: JSON string containing input variables for the expression set. Supports merge fields.

property.name: viewModeDefault
property.label: Default View Mode
property.description: Initial display mode for results

property.name: showViewToggle
property.label: Show View Toggle
property.description: Allow users to toggle between concise and detailed views

property.name: autoEvaluate
property.label: Auto Evaluate on Load
property.description: Automatically evaluate when the component loads

property.name: showInputs
property.label: Show Input Summary
property.description: Display the input values used in the evaluation

property.name: showOutputs
property.label: Show Output Summary
property.description: Display the calculated output values

property.name: className
property.label: Additional CSS Classes
property.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the component
